section.title: Invalid Script URI
section.p: The value of the parameter xcr:xsl does not represent an exisiting file.

section.title: Invalid Script
section.p: The value of the parameter xcr:xsl is not a valid XSL script, but the file exists.

section.title: Invalid XML Source URI
section.p: The value of the parameter xcr:source does not represent an exisiting file.

section.title: Invalid XML Source
section.p: The value of the parameter xcr:source is not a valid XML file, but it exists.

section.title: Runtime Error
section.p: The given XSL script causes a runtime error. (xsl:variable element has a select attribute, but the sequence constructor is not empty.)

section.title: Invalid Script with Undefined Parameters
section.p: The value of the parameter xcr:xsl is not a valid XSL script, therefore the undefined parameter and other parameters are neglected.

section.title: Valid Script with Undefined Parameters
section.p: The parameter 'xcr:undefined' is not defined. Other parameters are not neglected.

section.title: Valid Script
section.p: The value of 'xcr:xsl' represents a valid XSL script.

section.title: Valid Script with URN
section.p: Another valid script, but with URN. ('urn:schematron-test.xsl')

section.title: Valid XML Source with URN
section.p: The value of 'xcr:source' represents a valid XML file.

section.title: Valid Script with Parameters of Different Type
section.p: The element has valid custom parameters of different type.
